plot: A Swiss travel agent loses his job after the 2011 Tohoku earthquake and tsunami. Out of solidarity he decides to walk across Japan, 2900km from North to South in order to help. An inspiring post 3/11 documentary.
title: Negative: Nothing - Step by Step for Japan
plot_es: A Swiss travel agent loses his job after the 2011 Tohoku earthquake and tsunami. Out of solidarity he decides to walk across Japan, 2900km from North to South in order to help. An inspiring post 3/11 documentary.
